hints.content:
We start at $11{:}31$ when Zayed finished building his model airplane.

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 11:00 to 11:45 with tick marks at every 1 minute. The tick marks at 11:00, 11:15, 11:30, and 11:45 are labeled. A red circle appears on the unlabeled tick mark at 11:31. !

hints.content:
To determine what time Zayed started building his model airplane, we go **left** ${24}$ minutes from $11{:}31$.


[[☃ image 1]]

$\begin{align}
{11{:}31} -{} &\goldE{1}\text{ minute} = 11{:}30\\\\
{11{:}30} -{} &\purpleD{20}\text{ minutes} = 11{:}10\\\\
11{:}10 -{} & \blueD{3}\text{ minutes} = \greenD{11{:}07} 
\end{align}$

options.alt: A number line labeled 11:00 to 11:45 with tick marks at every 1 minute. The tick marks at 11:00, 11:15, 11:30, and 11:45 are labeled. A series of three arrows are shown moving right to left from the 11:31 tick mark to the 11:07 tick mark. The first arrow starts at the 11:31 tick mark and ends at the 11:30 tick mark and is labeled minus 1. The second arrow starts at the 11:30 tick mark and ends at the 11:10 tick mark and is labeled minus 20. The third arrow starts at the 11:10 tick mark and ends at the 11:07 tick mark and is labeled minus 3. !

hints.content:
Zayed started building his model airplane at $\greenD{11{:}07} $.  

Which clock shows $\greenD{11{:}07}$?

When Zayed started building his model airplane, the clock shows:

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand on the 11 and the long hand on the second tick mark after the 1. !

question.content:
Zayed builds a model airplane in $24$ minutes.  Zayed finished building at $11{:}31 \text { a.m.}$

**What time did the clock show when Zayed starts building the model airplane?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 11 and 12 and the long hand on the fourth tick mark after the 4.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/ed301afb1e93f7bf08dccb12146d82dbcf3b29d9)

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing both the short hand and the long hand on the 11.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/c3a81e05ed12275f435946986ef167ca7cd0a882)

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand on the 11 and the long hand on the second tick mark after the 1.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/da3d9a6f5f49180591e8c3d6299e255597be3716)
